string.name: name
string.value: The 2010 Winter King / Winter Queen Event!
Winter is here, and the chilly cold is already affecting everyone! If you wish to become the Winter King or Winter Queen of 2010, you'd better go see Cassandra.
Cassandra says she'll give you a Winter King or Winter Queen medal that can be used until midnight.
If you get more than 20 of these medals from Cassandra, then Cassandra will give you a medal that won't expire for 30 days.
